name: Gorge (itch)
description:
Gorge is a first-person puzzle-platformer game, where you use your telekinesis abilities on objects in order to create paths you can traverse using your parkour abilities.

Solve your way through the red rock canyons & waterfalls, the debris scattered gorge, a cave system, a reservoir and a crumbling dam.

A free, short game.

Pay more than $5 to get the "Special Features" pack:
- 7 Challenge Courses
- 17 Achievements
- Appreciation from the solo-developer
